name: Mushroom Detective
description:
Mushrooms, a witch, and a detective. Also a detective's assistant.

Mushroom Detective is a visual novel where you play a famous detective's assistant, Ryann Welkin. The famous detective, Shroomlock Sholmes, calls you on your day off and begs you to help. Somehow he turned into a mushroom? It's up to you to find a way to turn him back to a human... or not. 

  • three different unique endings.
  • roughly 15 minutes of game time
